thread.section_title: London House Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Small but nice
thread.title_full: Small but nice - Review of London House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: rebrophy
title: Small but nice
text:
Even though I had heard about the notoriously small London rooms. I laughed out loud when I saw our room. For Americans it is tiny.
Having said that, everything else about the hotel was very nice. Beds were nice and soft and had 2 pillows ea on a twin. Shower was new, had good pressure and plenty of heat.
Staff was outstanding. Got a great referral from Mauro on a place to buy a jacket.
Location is good too, although a hair tricky to find the first time. Close to lots of places to eat, the Tube and a HOHO bus stop.
Overall, we worth what we paid.
